|-|Common = {{Infobox item |name = Special Foot Wraps |image = XC3 Accessory Boot.png |caption = Boosts damage dealt indoors by 40%. |type = [[Accessory (XC3)|Accessory]] |xc3rarity = Common |source = |sell = 20,210 [[Gold|G]] }} |-|Rare = {{Infobox item |name = Special Foot Wraps |image = XC3 Accessory Boot.png |caption = Boosts damage dealt indoors by 42%. |type = [[Accessory (XC3)|Accessory]] |xc3rarity = Rare |source = |sell = 20,210 [[Gold|G]] }} |-|Legendary = {{Infobox item |name = Special Foot Wraps |image = XC3 Accessory Boot.png |caption = Boosts damage dealt indoors by 45%. |type = [[Accessory (XC3)|Accessory]] |xc3rarity = Legendary |source = |sell = 20,210 [[Gold|G]] }}
'''Special Foot Wraps''' are [[Accessory (XC3)|Accessories]] in {{XC3}} and {{XC3FR|sublink}}. {{clr}} {{xc3 stub}} {{fr stub}} [[Category:XC3 Accessories]] [[Category:XC3FR Accessories]]

{{Infobox XC3 Enemy |category = Unique Monster |name = Spectral Rémy |image = XC3 Spectral Rémy.png |caption = Spectral Rémy |type = [[Medooz]] |level = 42 |area = [[Great Sword's Base]] |spawntime = Anytime |respawn = Yes |movement = Air |detection = |exp = 748 |cp = 59 |sp = 5 |gold = 592 |hp = 910,800 |strength = 486 |healing = 390 |dexterity = 126 |agility = 66 |physdef = 0% |ethdef = 50% |critrate = 8% |guardrate = 0% }} '''Spectral Rémy''' is a [[Unique Monster (XC3)|Unique Monster]] in {{XC3}}. It is a member of the [[Medooz]] family, and can be found at level 42 on [[Bannis Path]] near [[Headwater Camp]] at the [[Great Sword's Base]]. The [[Toxic Gas]] [[Battle Arts (XC3)|Art]] can be earned by the [[Soulhacker]] [[Class (XC3)|class]] by defeating it.
== Resistances == {{XC3 Resistances |break = 50% |knockback = 50% |blowdown = 50% |physdebuff = 50% |etherdebuff = Immune }} {{clr}}
== Gallery == <gallery> Spectral remy location.png Spectral remy.png </gallery>
[[Category:XC3 Level 41-45 Enemies]] [[Category:XC3 Unique Monsters]] [[Category:XC3 Medoozes]] [[Category:Cadensia Region Enemies]] [[Category:XC3 Enemy pages needing drops]]

{{for|the Accessory in {{XC2|-}}|Spiked Pauldrons (XC2)}}
|-|Common = {{Infobox item |name = Spiked Pauldrons |image = File:XC3 Accessory Shirt.png |caption = Boosts Smash damage by 50%. |type = [[Accessory (XC3)|Accessory]] |xc3rarity = Common |source = |sell = 4960 [[Gold|G]] }} |-|Rare = {{Infobox item |name = Spiked Pauldrons |image = File:XC3 Accessory Shirt.png |caption = Boosts Smash damage by 55%. |type = [[Accessory (XC3)|Accessory]] |xc3rarity = Rare |source = |sell = 4960 [[Gold|G]] }} |-|Legendary = {{Infobox item |name = Spiked Pauldrons |image = File:XC3 Accessory Shirt.png |caption = Boosts Smash damage by 60%. |type = [[Accessory (XC3)|Accessory]] |xc3rarity = Legendary |source = |sell = 4960 [[Gold|G]] }}

{{Infobox Enemy |name = Squire Tirkin |image = |caption = Squire Tirkin |category = Minor Enemy |type = [[Tirkin]] |level = ? |area = [[Fornis Region]]
[[Pentelas Region]] |spawntime = Anytime |respawn = Yes |movement = |detection = |exp = |wp = |sp = }} '''Squire Tirkins''' are Minor Enemies in {{XC3}}. They are members of the [[Tirkin]] family, and can be found at level ? at [[Rae-Bel Tableland]] in the [[Fornis Region]] or at [[High Maktha Wildwood]] in the [[Pentelas Region]]. {{clr}} {{xc3 stub}} [[Category:XC3 Minor Enemies]] [[Category:Fornis Region Enemies]] [[Category:Pentelas Region Enemies]] [[Category:XC3 Tirkin Enemies]] [[Category:XC3 Challenge Battle Enemies]] [[Category:XC3 Enemy pages needing an infobox image]] [[Category:XC3 Enemy pages needing stats]] [[Category:XC3 Enemy pages needing drops]] [[Category:XC3 Enemy infobox to replace]]

{{spoiler}} {{quote|An Attacker who excels at sniping foes with arrows and hunting them from the safety of stealth.|Class menu description}} [[File:XC3 Stalker Weapon Icon.png|thumb|Stalker class icon]] '''Stalker''' (Japanese: {{lang|ja|幻弓士}}, ''Genkyūshi'', Phantom Archer) is an [[Agnus|Agnian]] [[Attacker]] [[Class (XC3)|class]] in {{XC3}}.[https://twitter.com/XenobladeJP/status/1536243206710784001] == Overview == Stalkers wield a bow and specialize at sniping [[Enemy (XC3)|enemies]] with arrows and hunting them from the safety of stealth; while it has low attack power compared to other Attacker classes, it is better able to manage its aggro levels. It is the class of [[Juniper]]. It is unlocked by completing ''[[Natural Selection]]''. The [[Class Rank (XC3)|Class Rank]] maximum is increased to 20 by completing the [[Hero Quest|Ascension Quest]] ''[[Survivors]]''. {{clr}} ==Class Aptitude and Unlock Requirements== {|class="xc1 centered" style="width:100%; valign:center;" !Party Member |[[File:Icon chara battle n0ah.png|60px]]
'''[[Noah]]''' |[[File:Icon chara battle 1.png|60px]]
'''[[Mio]]''' |[[File:Icon chara battle 2.png|60px]]
'''[[Eunie]]''' |[[File:Icon chara battle 3.png|60px]]
'''[[Taion]]''' |[[File:Icon chara battle 4.png|60px]]
'''[[Lanz]]''' |[[File:Icon chara battle 5.png|60px]]
'''[[Sena]]''' |- !Aptitude |[[File:XC3 Aptitude S Icon.png|35px]]||[[File:XC3 Aptitude D Icon.png|35px]]||[[File:XC3 Aptitude B Icon.png|35px]]||[[File:XC3 Aptitude B Icon.png|35px]]||[[File:XC3 Aptitude C Icon.png|35px]]||[[File:XC3 Aptitude A Icon.png|35px]] |- !Class Unlock Points Required |''Class Inheritor'' |6,125 |3,500 |4,375 |5,250 |2,625 |} == Class Rank Requirements == {| class="xc1 centered" width="45%" ! Rank ! CP needed ! Nopon Coin Cost |- | 1 | colspan="2" | None |- | 2 | 225 | [[File:Nopon Coin Silver.png|link=Nopon Coin (Silver)|38px]] x 2 |- | 3 | 225 | [[File:Nopon Coin Silver.png|link=Nopon Coin (Silver)|38px]] x 2 |- | 4 | 275 | [[File:Nopon Coin Silver.png|link=Nopon Coin (Silver)|38px]] x 3 |- | 5 | 275 | [[File:Nopon Coin Silver.png|link=Nopon Coin (Silver)|38px]] x 3 |- | 6 | 335 | [[File:Nopon Coin Silver.png|link=Nopon Coin (Silver)|38px]] x 3 |- | 7 | 335 | [[File:Nopon Coin Silver.png|link=Nopon Coin (Silver)|38px]] x 3 |- | 8 | 360 | [[File:Nopon Coin Silver.png|link=Nopon Coin (Silver)|38px]] x 3 |- | 9 | 360 | [[File:Nopon Coin Silver.png|link=Nopon Coin (Silver)|38px]] x 3 |- | 10 | 385 | [[File:Nopon Coin Silver.png|link=Nopon Coin (Silver)|38px]] x 4 |- | colspan="3" class="event" | Complete ''[[Survivors]]'' |- | 11 | 340 | [[File:Nopon Coin Silver.png|link=Nopon Coin (Silver)|38px]] x 4 |- | 12 | 340 | [[File:Nopon Coin Silver.png|link=Nopon Coin (Silver)|38px]] x 4 |- | 13 | 450 | [[File:Nopon Coin Silver.png|link=Nopon Coin (Silver)|38px]] x 4 |- | 14 | 450 | [[File:Nopon Coin Silver.png|link=Nopon Coin (Silver)|38px]] x 5 |- | 15 | 565 | [[File:Nopon Coin Silver.png|link=Nopon Coin (Silver)|38px]] x 5 |- | 16 | 565 | [[File:Nopon Coin Silver.png|link=Nopon Coin (Silver)|38px]] x 5 |- | 17 | 675 | [[File:Nopon Coin Silver.png|link=Nopon Coin (Silver)|38px]] x 5 |- | 18 | 675 | [[File:Nopon Coin Silver.png|link=Nopon Coin (Silver)|38px]] x 6 |- | 19 | 725 | [[File:Nopon Coin Silver.png|link=Nopon Coin (Silver)|38px]] x 6 |- | 20 | 840 | [[File:Nopon Coin Silver.png|link=Nopon Coin (Silver)|38px]] x 6 |} {{clr}} == Class Stats == The Stalker class grants the following multipliers to a character's base stats (see their individual pages for their base stats), and sets their Physical and Ether Defense to the following values, depending on their current Rank. Intermediate values are linearly interpolated between the minimum and maximum values, rounding to the nearest percent. {| class="xc1 centered" width="100%" ! Rank !! HP !! Attack !! Healing Power !! Dexterity !! Agility !! Physical Defense !! Ether Defense |- | 1 || 65% || 100% || 20% || 120% || 120% || 10% || 10% |- | 10 || 67% || 105% || 22% || 125% || 125% || 12% || 12% |- | 20 || 70% || 110% || 25% || 130% || 130% || 15% || 15% |} === Weapon Stats === The character's Attack stat after being modified by the above class stats is further modified by adding the class's weapon stat, which depends on the character's [[Level (XC3)|Level]], to obtain the final base Attack stat. These weapon stats also determine the character's Critical Rate and Block Rate. Characters temporarily assume these weapon stats to calculate relevant statistics when using a Master Art from this Class without it being part of a Fusion Art. If a Master Art is used in a Fusion Art, the weapon stats corresponding to the character's current Class will be used instead for calculations. {| class="xc1 centered" width="60%" ! Level !! Attack !! Critical Rate !! Block Rate |- | 1 || 18 || 20% || 3% |- | 10 || 39 || 21% || 3% |- | 20 || 71 || 22% || 4% |- | 30 || 110 || 23% || 4% |- | 40 || 153 || 24% || 4% |- | 50 || 205 || 25% || 5% |- | 60 || 260 || 26% || 5% |- | 70 || 323 || 27% || 5% |- | 80 || 395 || 28% || 5% |- | 90 || 474 || 29% || 6% |- | 99 || 554 || 30% || 6% |} == Arts == * '''[[Refreshing Rain]]''' ([[Battle Arts (XC3)|Talent Art]]), AOE/Wounded enemy↑ * '''[[Landslide]]''', [[Launch (XC3)|Launched]]↑ / Evade * '''[[Staying Power]]''', Field / [[Art Follow-Up]] * '''[[Driving Arrow]]''', Back [[Bleed (XC3)|Bleed]] * '''[[Rapid Shot]]''', Side attack↑ * '''[[Night Hunt]]''', Slower aggro/Back atk+ === Hero-Exclusive Arts === * '''[[Downdraft]]''', Back [[Bleed (XC3)|Bleed]] * '''[[Force of Nature]]''', Field / Art Follow-up * '''[[Liberation Arrow]]''', Side attack↑ == Class Skills == * [[File:XC3 Skill Icon 12.png]] '''Serene Heart''': Reduces aggro generated from attacks by 25-50%. * [[File:XC3 Skill Icon 10.png]] '''Swift Death''': Deals 50-70% more damage against enemies who are at 30% HP or less. (Rank 15 Master Skill) * [[File:XC3 Skill Icon 24.png]] '''In Cold Blood''': Boosts damage dealt by 75-150% when attacking an enemy suffering from Bleed. * [[File:XC3 Skill Icon 9.png]] '''Evasion Expertise''': 30-50% chance to evade ranged attacks. (Rank 5 Master Skill) === Stat Increases === {| class="xc1 centered" style="width:80%;" !Class Rank !Swift Death !In Cold Blood !Evasion Expertise !Serene Heart |- | 1 | 50% | 75% | 30% | 25% |- | 5 | 55% | 85% | 35% | 35% |- | 10 | 60% | 100% | 40% | 40% |- | 15 | 65% | 120% | 45% | 45% |- | 20 | 70% | 150% | 50% | 50% |} == Gallery == XC3 Juniper Artwork.png|Juniper, a Stalker Stalker Noah.png|Noah as a Stalker Stalker Mio.png|Mio as a Stalker Stalker Eunie.png|Eunie as a Stalker Stalker Taion.png|Taion as a Stalker Stalker Lanz.png|Lanz as a Stalker Stalker Sena.png|Sena as a Stalker == References == {{xc3 stub}} [[Category:XC3 Classes]]

|-|Common = {{Infobox item |name = Star Necklace |image = File:XC3 Accessory Choker.png |caption = Grants 60% resistance to Shackle Arts. |type = [[Accessory (XC3)|Accessory]] |xc3rarity = Common |source = |sell = 9720 [[Gold|G]] }} |-|Rare = {{Infobox item |name = Star Necklace |image = File:XC3 Accessory Choker.png |caption = Grants 65% resistance to Shackle Arts. |type = [[Accessory (XC3)|Accessory]] |xc3rarity = Rare |source = |sell = 9720 [[Gold|G]] }} |-|Legendary = {{Infobox item |name = Star Necklace |image = File:XC3 Accessory Choker.png |caption = Grants 70% resistance to Shackle Arts. |type = [[Accessory (XC3)|Accessory]] |xc3rarity = Legendary |source = |sell = 9720 [[Gold|G]] }}

{{Infobox XC3 Enemy |category = Unique Monster |name = Stately Doramma |image = XC3 Aquatic Beasts.png |caption = Stately Doramma (right) |type = [[Quarmu]] |level = 64 |area = [[Great Cotte Falls]] ([[Cotte Fountainhead]]) |spawntime = Anytime |respawn = Yes |movement = Water |detection = |exp = 1,763 |cp = 108 |sp = 5 |gold = 1,255 |hp = 1,663,200 |strength = 1,242 |healing = 448 |dexterity = 203 |agility = 172 |physdef = 10% |ethdef = -10% |critrate = 15% |guardrate = 0% }} '''Stately Doramma''' is a [[Unique Monster (XC3)|Unique Monster]] in {{XC3}}. It is a member of the [[Quarmu]] family, and can be found at level 64 at the [[Cotte Fountainhead]] on [[Great Cotte Falls]]. It forms the "Aquatic Beasts" duo with [[Saberly Dorampé]]. The [[Soulhacker#Enemy Skills|Scattered Healing]] [[Skill (XC3)|Skill]] can be earned for the [[Soulhacker]] [[Class (XC3)|class]] by defeating it. == Resistances == {{XC3 Resistances |break = 50% |knockback = 100% |blowdown = 100% |physdebuff = 75% |etherdebuff = 50% }} {{clr}} == Gallery == <gallery> Aquatic beasts location.png Aquatic beasts doramma.png </gallery>
